response.overview: University is a transition to society, where one experiences the changing dynamics of human relations and personal growth, while facing struggles and self-doubt. Young men Houjue and Lissa, passionate and dedicated, form a close bond but are overwhelmed by financial difficulties. To help Houjue achieve his dreams, Lissa sacrifices herself by trading with Zhao Ding, but the situation takes a dramatic turn when Houjue discovers the truth, leading to a tragic confrontation.
response.title: The Rules of Room 301
